attributes.action: Abolish cash benefits for children and bring in clothing and food vouchers instead.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It's hard to believe in this country today, many children are still living in poverty, and being abused and murdered by the very people meant to protect them. It is also obvious that too many people view becoming a parent as a gravy train, a meal ticket, and a means of aquiring a house.
The welfare of their child is, at best, secondary, at worst, a hindrance, to the parents' own needs for material posessions / cigarettes / alcohol / drugs.
The incentive to bring the child into the world is not based upon love, so subsequently the child will not be loved. We need to remove this cash incentive, but still retain the facility to provide for the child.
Child Benefit's should benefit the children, not the parent(s).
